## Find A Store

Input your location and see the Gloworld or GloZone Shop nearest to you.

Allow location access to see the nearest stores and get accurate directions.

##### üìç Location Access Required

We need your location to find the nearest stores and provide accurate directions.

**Android**

Settings ‚Üí Apps ‚Üí [Your Browser] ‚Üí Permissions ‚Üí Location

**iPhone/iPad**

Settings ‚Üí Privacy & Security ‚Üí Location Services ‚Üí [Your Browser]

**Desktop**

Click the location icon üìç in your browser's address bar and select "Allow"

**After enabling location access, refresh this page to find stores near you!**

Auto-detect my location

## GLO CAFE - Where it all Goes Down

Glo Cafe app is a one-stop destination for managing your Globacom account, bill payments, mobile recharges and entertainment. The Glo Cafe App gives you the power to manage all your connections and services through one application.

[![App Store](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://apps.apple.com/ng/app/glo-caf%C3%A9/id1236642119) [![Play Store](data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhAQABAIAAAAAAAP///yH5BAEAAAAALAAAAAABAAEAAAIBRAA7)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.one97.selfcare.globacom)

##### Privacy & Cookies Consent

Your privacy is very important to us and we only process your personal information to enhance your experience. Continuing to use this platform indicates your consent to the processing of your personal information by Globacom in accordance with NDPA. We use cookies for tracking, analytics, and content delivery from other sites.

[More info](/ng/policies)
